key_risks: Profitability challenges, particularly in U.S. operations
Intense competition from global and local e-commerce players
Regulatory risks related to data privacy and anti-money laundering
Dependence on the Japanese market, making it vulnerable to domestic economic fluctuations
controversies: Strategic pullbacks from international markets due to competitive pressures
environmental_issues: Promotion of sustainable consumption through resale of used items and waste reduction initiatives
social_issues: Maintaining user trust and reputation in the face of potential fraud and counterfeit goods
governance_issues: Exposure to regulatory scrutiny and potential increases in compliance costs
